material.mattext: Older users tend to choose the existing software and to have a high level of satisfaction for any product.

Good Job! Indeed, we'll never be able to know whether the high level of satisfaction with the current product is because users really like it, or because the age of the those who chose to use it. Older people will tend to choose it, and they usually have a high level of satisfaction of any product.

Incorrect. Actually age is the right answer. We'll never be able to know whether the high level of satisfaction with the current product is because users really like it, or because the age of the those who chose to use it. Older people will tend to choose it, and they usually have a high level of satisfaction of any product.
